name: Ravenfield
description: Fight upon the Ravenfield together with your Blue allies! Take down those pesky Reds using helicopters, tanks, guns, and active ragdoll physics!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: 32-bit, 2 GHz or Faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 64-bit, 3 GHz or Faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
